long_description: The Teva Psyclone 3 Sandals feature quality materials that offer traction in slippery environments and all-day comfort so your little one can play just like the big boys. Open-toe construction does not allow water to pool. Neoprene and synthetic uppers repel water; soft mesh lining lets feet breathe. Nonmarking Durabrasion Rubber(TM) outsoles provide durable traction. Microban zinc-based antimicrobial protection fights odor. Compression molded EVA topsole provides total comfort. Teva Psyclone 3 Sandals have encapsulated Shoc Pads(TM) in the heels to absorb shock.
short_description: The Teva Psyclone 3 Sandals feature quality materials that offer traction in slippery environments and all-day comfort so your little one can play just like the big boys.
